Package edu.cs495.game.objects.chatbox

    Interface Description
    ChatListener
    A chat listener listens for chat dialogue and handles updates

    ChatConsole
    A chatbox for the game

    This handles one line of text in the chatview

    This is the Observer design pattern class for the Subject in the relationship

    A chat textbox line to type in
